item.title: Postgres full text search
item.description: In this guide we will walk through how to implement a full text search in Postgres to create a custom SQL function and expose it to the GraphQL API. What is FTS? Imagine we have a set of text documents stored in a database. These documents could be an abstract of certain text article or the entire article itself and we want to find out if certain words are present in them or not.
